comments.body: @MaxGekk For `Sum`,  `resultType` is the same as `child.dataType` but for `Average` `resultType` is always `YearMonthIntervalType(0, 1)`. Is this intended behavior?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +58,62 @@    case DecimalType.Fixed(p, s) =>
      DecimalType.bounded(p + 4, s + 4)
    case _: YearMonthIntervalType => YearMonthIntervalType()
    case _: DayTimeIntervalType => DayTimeIntervalType()
    case _ => DoubleType
